actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 United States Code relating to retirement computation for law enforcement officials.

summary.text: Provides retirement computations under the civil service retirement system for law enforcement officials. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 8339 (d))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 United States Code relating to retirement computation for law enforcement officials.
